description:
go.net/websocket: fix server and client examples

Fix import path, and remove some unnecessary semicolons.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

On 2012/09/05 12:10:21, dfc wrote:
> On 2012/09/05 11:56:57, fss wrote:
> > Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com, mailto:dave@cheney.net (cc:
> > mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> > 
> > Please take another look.
> 
> Thank you very much. Could I ask you to use the // style, not the /* */ style
> now that the comment block is much smaller.

Good catch, I didn't notice this. I was in a hurry when I sent patch  set 5, sorry.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.net

On 2012/09/04 13:25:11, fss wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go.net

Thank you for fixing this. Could I convince you convert these examples to real testing.Example style examples so they don't get out of date again.

Also, can you please make the CL description, go.net/websocket: ...

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2513e9008213&repo=net ***

go.net/websocket: fix server and client examples

Fix import path, and remove some unnecessary semicolons.

R=golang-dev, dave, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6506068

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

On 2012/09/05 11:56:57, fss wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com, mailto:dave@cheney.net (cc:
> mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> Please take another look.

Thank you very much. Could I ask you to use the // style, not the /* */ style now that the comment block is much smaller.

subject: code review 6506068: go.net/websocket: fix server and client examples
